affiliate_seo_title: Affiliate Program - Earn Up to 20% Commission
affiliate_seo_description: Join Stocknear's Affiliate Program and earn up to 20% commission on every sale. Refer customers and start earning cash today!
affiliate_subtitle: Become a Stocknear affiliate today & earn 20% on each sale!
affiliate_subtitle_plain: Become a Stocknear affiliate today & earn 20% on each sale!
affiliate_description: Refer customers and start earning cash today!
affiliate_q1_answer: Affiliate partnerships are one of the simplest yet most profitable ways to make money online. You send customers our way, and we'll pay you for it.
affiliate_q2_answer: You can earn up to $119.8 commission on every referral that results in a successful sale. There's no limit to how much you can make by promoting us.
affiliate_q3_answer: Yes, we offer recurring commissions! That means as long as your referred customer remains a subscriber, you'll continue earning 20% on every payment they make.
affiliate_q4_answer: We payout on NET30 terms to account for refunds and chargebacks. For example, commissions generated in January would be paid out on March 15th (NET30).
affiliate_q5_title: How do I make money as an affiliate?
affiliate_q5_answer: All you have to do is recommend us using your affiliate link on your website, blog, and social media. We track your clicks and transactions so you can get paid.
affiliate_q6_answer: We require a minimum balance of $50.00 before processing an affiliate payout. We set this to avoid any fraudulent issues with our affiliate program.
affiliate_q7_answer: The Lemon Squeezy affiliate hub hosts our affiliate program. Click the "Become an affiliate" button below to create a Lemon Squeezy account and join our program.
